sub_features.name: Comprehensive Traces
sub_features.notes: Captures exact inputs, outputs, parameters, latency, and metadata for every request

sub_features.name: Span Hierarchy
sub_features.notes: Spans nest inside each other to visualize the execution flow and application structure

sub_features.name: Stream Responses
sub_features.notes: Real-time streaming response deployment and monitoring support explicitly documented

sub_features.name: Log Attachments
sub_features.notes: Allows logging of generic data capabilities via attachments, but explicit multimodal rendering interfaces are not strictly documented

sub_features.name: Attachment Rendering
sub_features.notes: Custom trace views natively support directly rendering embedded object resources, audio, video, and image attachments safely.

sub_features.name: Wrap AI Providers
sub_features.notes: Automatically logs all LLM calls from major AI providers and frameworks with minimal setup

sub_features.name: Metadata & Filtering
sub_features.notes: Attaches custom metadata and leverages BTQL/search capabilities to filter logs and discover insights

sub_features.name: Automated Topic Classification
sub_features.notes: Utilizes machine learning to automatically cluster and conceptually classify logs to surface semantic metadata and topic domains.

sub_features.name: Advanced Span Aggregations
sub_features.notes: Enhances SQL querying via combining singular constraints alongside aggregation groupings natively restricted by output limit limits.

sub_features.name: Topic Maps
sub_features.notes: Combines preprocessors and AI prompts to automatically summarize and categorize logs into meaningful topics, supporting both custom and built-in maps including Task, Sentiment, and Issues.

sub_features.name: Token Usage Tracking
sub_features.notes: Automatically accounts for input and output token counts and calculates costs automatically

sub_features.name: OpenTelemetry Support
sub_features.notes: Standardized trace and span compatibility via integrated OpenTelemetry pipelines

sub_features.name: Vector Database Searches
sub_features.notes: Logs vector DB retrieval directly inside spans, but does not identify dedicated external document visualizers

sub_features.name: Tool & Function Spans
sub_features.notes: Detailed parsing and rendering of tool and nested function invocation within trace boundaries

sub_features.name: Service Maps & Hierarchy
sub_features.notes: Highlights agent execution logic temporally and hierarchically, without dedicated workflow DAG graph visualizations

sub_features.name: Agent Reasoning Steps
sub_features.notes: Isolates and visualizes intermediate multi-stage agent states and Chain-of-Thought debugging paths

sub_features.name: Multi-turn Sessions
sub_features.notes: Tracks conversation contexts across sessions manually but lacks isolated end-to-end replay players

sub_features.name: Error Detection
sub_features.notes: Captures explicit error rates per span and flags failed hierarchy executions organically

sub_features.name: Model Context Protocol
sub_features.notes: Functions natively with MCP server implementations

sub_features.name: Code Editor Plugins
sub_features.notes: Auto-installation resources directly connecting programmatic workspaces via official Cursor, Claude Code, and OpenCode application bounds.

sub_features.name: Loop Agent
sub_features.notes: GUI-based AI assistant to generate scorers efficiently without programmatic instructions

sub_features.name: Loop Agent Context Tools
sub_features.notes: Enhances the integrated chat interface handling rapid query modifications, mentions referencing data sources seamlessly alongside support logic.

sub_features.name: Scorer Library
sub_features.notes: Permits extensive development via automated factuality metrics, algorithmic comparisons, and custom code-based validation

sub_features.name: Full Execution Trace Access
sub_features.notes: Equips evaluation handlers holistic insight into overarching operation sequences scoring complex agent workflow progression comprehensively.

sub_features.name: Dataset Curation
sub_features.notes: Transforms live interactions into structured test scenarios and exports refined human validation inputs automatically

sub_features.name: Trace Origin Navigation
sub_features.notes: Grants isolated trace linkage mapping operational iterations directly reverting to defined dataset seeds and specific instructions continuously.

sub_features.name: DSPy Integrations & Loop
sub_features.notes: Direct DSPy integration mapping alongside AI-assisted optimization iterations directly against established data

sub_features.name: Offline Eval Experiments
sub_features.notes: Automates tracking offline metrics prior to release, contrasting performance to restrict pipeline regressions

sub_features.name: Compare Experiments
sub_features.notes: Highlights specific iteration impacts simultaneously visualizing parameter differences and baseline behavior

sub_features.name: Human Validation Views
sub_features.notes: Grants annotation and correction labels manually but lacks explicit dedicated role-based queue task allocation metrics

sub_features.name: Production Scoring
sub_features.notes: Monitors active behavior and triggers automatic scoring functions simultaneously indexing interactions organically

sub_features.name: Image Rendering Controls
sub_features.notes: Enforces operational blocks or click-to-load permissions restricting external rendering and containing potential sensitive metadata leaks explicitly.

sub_features.name: Factuality Scorer
sub_features.notes: Exposes qualitative metrics isolating inaccuracies but lacks fully dedicated real-time guardrail circuit breaking explicitly mapped for hallucinations

sub_features.name: Safety Evaluators
sub_features.notes: Uses established custom scorers for general safety blocking without defining explicit out-of-the-box jailbreak implementations

sub_features.name: Cost Tracking
sub_features.notes: Continuously records per-span API pricing models resolving detailed deployment expenditure

sub_features.name: Token Dashboards
sub_features.notes: Provides trends delineating inputs vs returned output computations directly tied to LLM overhead

sub_features.name: Latency Timing Metrics
sub_features.notes: Logs operational initiation times enabling analytical review but lacking purely plotted analytical heatmaps explicitly detailed

sub_features.name: Exception Monitoring
sub_features.notes: Enables proactive operational anomaly thresholds mapping failed traces continuously

sub_features.name: Custom Dashboards
sub_features.notes: User-defined views parsing distinct structured parameters across production insights manually

sub_features.name: Prompt Environments & Deployments
sub_features.notes: Governs instructions dynamically, distributing variations systematically independent of manual engineering codebase modifications

sub_features.name: Playgrounds
sub_features.notes: A responsive no-code interactive utility validating specific outputs utilizing internal historical environments iteratively

sub_features.name: Offline Experiments
sub_features.notes: Records complex variant performance combinations referencing alternative implementations systematiucally

sub_features.name: Reusable Evaluation Parameters
sub_features.notes: Allows versioned configuration variables isolating environment-bound inputs deployed dynamically throughout multiple remote sandbox evaluations.

sub_features.name: Component Versioning
sub_features.notes: Organizes deployment updates securely tracking previous alterations ready to instantly deploy rollback configurations

sub_features.name: TypeScript/Python Libraries
sub_features.notes: Official TypeScript and Python abstractions are extensive, whereas alternative stacks fundamentally rely on overarching OpenTelemetry pipelines

sub_features.name: AI Gateway
sub_features.notes: Manages AI boundaries via API routing endpoints comprehensively. Proxy endpoints exist but are currently designated deprecated.

sub_features.name: Multi-Provider Utility API
sub_features.notes: Standardizes diverse vendor endpoint deployments handling caching routing multi- provision capabilities via individual external operational SDK structures.

sub_features.name: Agent & SDK Integrations
sub_features.notes: Compatible directly with AutoGen, Vercel AI SDK, LangGraph, LLamaIndex, CrewAI natively mapped.

sub_features.name: LangSmith Interoperability
sub_features.notes: Implements an experimental structured boundary to concurrently push evaluation logging tracking onto parallel third-party deployment monitoring targets natively.

sub_features.name: Rest Integrations & Automations
sub_features.notes: Presents structured querying parameters mapping directly toward external data handlers

sub_features.name: CLI Eval Commands
sub_features.notes: Automates quality validation executing structural tasks seamlessly attached to build deployments automatically

sub_features.name: Multi-Function CLI Utility
sub_features.notes: A discrete command-line suite interacting across operational syncing queries managing projects evaluation executing and programmatic profiles thoroughly.

sub_features.name: Cloud Hosted / Self-hosting
sub_features.notes: Provisioned strictly supporting common cloud delivery alongside distinct self-hosted Docker architectures (dedicated explicit VPC isolation instances are not defined)

sub_features.name: Self-hosted Packages
sub_features.notes: Permits isolated manual execution boundaries although establishing comprehensive core enterprise services typically relies on primary platforms

sub_features.name: Data Boundaries
sub_features.notes: Mitigates externalized storage restrictions via internal self-hosting, though dedicated pre-certified SOC 2 validation bounds natively within the core documentation are absent

sub_features.name: Access Control & Authentication
sub_features.notes: Implements discrete organizational privilege modeling systematically handling administrative access layers and authentication

sub_features.name: Operational Tracking
sub_features.notes: Supports internal behavior parsing across project implementations natively but extensive manual user compliance action logs lack complete documented breakdowns

sub_features.name: Annotated Exporters
sub_features.notes: Distributes analytical files programmatically standardizing downstream insights referencing structured outputs natively
